description:
## Horizontal Grid Cells Registration

Register horizontal grid cell properties.

Defines the physical characteristics and location of grid cells.

Grid cell IDs are automatically generated.

label: Description
description: Description to distinguish these grid cells from similar ones.\n\nInclude key characteristics like resolution and domain.
placeholder: e.g., Global regular lat-lon grid with 1.25° x 0.9° resolution

label: Grid Type
description:
How cells are distributed over the region.

- regular-latitude-longitude: Uniform lat-lon spacing
- reduced-gaussian: Gaussian with varying longitudinal points
- linear-spectral-gaussian: Spectral transform grid
- tripolar: Three-pole ocean grid
- cubed-sphere: Cube projected onto sphere
- unstructured-polygon: Irregular mesh
- plane-projection: Projected coordinate grid

label: Grid Mapping
description:
Coordinate reference system.

- latitude-longitude: Standard spherical coordinates
- rotated-latitude-longitude: Rotated pole coordinates
- polar-stereographic: Polar projection
- lambert-conformal-conic: Lambert projection

label: Region
description:
Geographic region(s) covered by the grid.

- global: Whole Earth
- antarctica: Antarctic region
- greenland: Greenland region
- limited-area: Regional model domain

label: Temporal Refinement
description:
How the grid varies with time.

- static: Fixed grid
- adaptive: Mesh refinement
- dynamically-stretched: Moving mesh

label: X Resolution
description: Cell size in X direction (longitude for spherical).\n\nOmit if varies more than 25%.

label: Y Resolution
description: Cell size in Y direction (latitude for spherical).\n\nOmit if varies more than 25%.

label: Units
description: Physical units for resolution values.\n\nRequired if x_resolution or y_resolution is provided.

label: Number of Cells
description: Total number of horizontal cells.\n\nLeave blank if variable (e.g., adaptive grids).

label: Southernmost Latitude
description: Southernmost latitude in degrees north.\n\nMust be -90 to 90. Leave blank if not applicable.

label: Westernmost Longitude
description: Westernmost longitude in degrees east.\n\nMust be 0 to <360. Leave blank if not applicable.
### Spectral Grid Options\n\nOnly for spectral/Gaussian grids:

label: Truncation Method
description: Method for truncating spherical harmonics.\n\nOnly applicable for spectral models.

label: Truncation Number
description: Zonal wave number for spectral truncation.\n\nOnly applicable for spectral models.

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
